product_name: freshMini Soy pH-Balanced Hydrating Face Wash
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackFresh's Soy pH-Balanced Hydrating Face Wash is a universal, gentle-yet-effective face cleanser that instantly soothes, hydrates & removes everyday makeup for a healthy look over time.
details: DetailsBenefitsSupports skin's moisture barrierInstantly calms visible redness & hydratesDelivers a clear, healthy look over timeKey IngredientsSoy Proteins: help retain hydration, improve elasticity & smooth skin.Aloe Vera: helps to soothe & hydrate the skin.Cucumber Extract: helps to provide a cooling effect & crisp, refreshing scent.Research Results+10% hydration, even after you rinse*Proven effective on all skin types & tones, including sensitive**Scientifically proven to maintain skinâ€™s pH*98% agreed it deeply cleanses pores****instrumental test, 11 subjects**skin types normal, dry, oily, combination, sensitive; skin tones tested using the Fitzpatrick scale***self-assessment, 122 subjects, 4 weeksItem 2593080How To UseWet the skin and massage over face and eyes to clear skin of dirt and makeup, then rinse. Use daily, morning and night. Special note: It's ophthalmologist-tested to be suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers and helps to remove stubborn eye makeup-including mascara!IngredientsAqua (water), Coco-glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Cucumis Sativus (cucumber) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (sunflower) Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Rosa Damascena Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Malva Sylvestris (mallow) Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Tocopherol, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Silica, Citric Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Caramel, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wet the skin and massage over face and eyes to clear skin of dirt and makeup, then rinse. Use daily, morning and night. Special note: It's ophthalmologist-tested to be suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers and helps to remove stubborn eye makeup-including mascara!

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I love love love this product it doesn't dry you skin or make it look dull. I've used it for about a year and will continue to use it for now on.

reviews.headline: Best cleanser I've ever used.
reviews.comments: Without a gift card and coupon I never would have tried this. I'm glad I did. I love it. It has the best texture. It feels like it lathers even though it doesn't. My face is so soft and clean. I wish I could afford to always use this. It is amazing.

reviews.headline: Something is very different with this face wash
reviews.comments: Bought before worked great both my daughter snd i loved this is not the same are skin broke out and for that kind of money its just not right to let us know it was reformulated

reviews.headline: They Reformulated :(
reviews.comments: Used to be my holy grail for gentle cleansing. Now it makes my face burn/sting like sunburn after using it. Also has a heavier floral fragrance than it used to. It cleans very well and isnt drying but man it's just super disappointing that it's no longer safe for sensitive skin. It also keeps getting more and more expensice. I will not be repurchasing again sadly.

reviews.headline: Holy grail for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This is the only skin cleanser I've reliably been able to use for years. I have very sensitive skin, with many soaps giving me dermatitis (including cerave weirdly enough.) this face wash has never steered me wrongâ€”it washes off all my makeup, doesn't irritate my skin, and has helped me control the oiliness of my face. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.headline: It didn't make my sensitive skin angry!
reviews.comments: W/o giving TMI, I've had heslth issues lately & they've made my immune system & skin very sensitive to the point that skincare I've used for years with no problem gave me horrible breakouts, redness, burning, etc. This cleanser was on the very short list of products that worked for me! Nice not overpowering scent, love the texture, unclogged my pores without harsh exfoliation or chemicals. I recommend!

reviews.headline: Will buy this forever
reviews.comments: This soy cleanser by Fresh fully cleans your face , wipes away makeup without drying your face out . Love it .

reviews.headline: Gentle on skin and removes makeup - Bonus!
reviews.comments: I love all Fresh Beauty products - this is no exception. Wash your hands before washing your face; i.e. clean oils from your skin. Otherwise it won't lather. My only issue is the smell - not bad, just not fragrant; but it doesn't linger

reviews.headline: My go to cleanser
reviews.comments: This is a very effective yet mild cleanser. I have dry sensitive skin, it suits me. My son has oily skin it suits him aswell. There's no tight feeling after the wash. Thumbs up!

reviews.headline: Good clean face wash
reviews.comments: I liked this face wash a lot.  It doesn't foam much and the smell was a bit strong.  But my face feels clean after using and not stripped .  It was expensive unfortunately.  For a face wash the price is way too high.  However, the container is large so it will last a fairly long time.  I love the pump instead of those awful tubes.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: This has helped my skin so much. I absolutely love the fresh scent too. I feel it doesn't dry me out either, like other cleansers.

reviews.headline: Used to be great!
reviews.comments: I used this for years in a double cleanse as a makeup remover and it worked wonderfully. It looks like they changed the formula, and now, it doesn't work. It doesn't remove spf effectively, and you still end up with a significant amount of makeup on your face. They also changed the smell from that lovely, distinct Fresh smell to something almostâ€¦plastic like. It doesn't even work as a stand alone face wash. I've used it by itself in the morning, and when I take a cotton pad with miceller water to my skin, i still have residue on the pad. It certainly isn't worth the money, and Fresh destroyed a wonderful product.

reviews.headline: I buy this every time
reviews.comments: Great cleanser that removes makeup , even eye makeup, without drying out your skin. I'll never buy another cleanser !!

reviews.headline: Again on my second bottle
reviews.comments: The cleanser is light and cleanse makeup off easily with one wipe

reviews.headline: This is my go to facial cleanser.
reviews.comments: I keep trying other facial cleansers and ALWAYS come back to this one.  My skin does really well with the Fresh product line.

reviews.headline: Removes makeup.
reviews.comments: Love it, takes off all your makeup even eye makeup. This is a one stop shop! Only downfall its expensive.

reviews.headline: Always come back
reviews.comments: The fresh cucumber scent always draws me back. I experiment with other cleansers that are less expensive but this one is my favorite. If I have a lot of makeup or heavy sunscreen on I will use a makeup up remover first but, usually this does the job.

reviews.headline: It Is Nice
reviews.comments: I have dry, insanely sensitive skin. It is over-priced, but it seems to work well on my skin. It cleans without stripping my skin. It does not seem to moisturize, but I have not noticed any negative effects.

reviews.headline: Broke me out
reviews.comments: Going back to my simple cetaphil. This is why I don't try nothing new ... too many ingredients. Broke me out.

reviews.headline: THE BEST
reviews.comments: This stuff is my cleanser holy grail. It has literally transformed my skin. I jumped on the Medicube train and stripped my skin. Went back to my Fresh cleanser with CosRx serum and moisturizer and back to my healthy, plump, glowing skin. One trick with this cleanser though is to make sure youre cleansing properly. Put a good amount and really massage into skin for a full minute. In about a week your skin will be so balanced and "fresh"ðŸ¥°

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this cleanser twice a day (morning & evening). I can't use harsh products on my face. But this cleanser leaves my skin feeling smooth and not dry. After I use this cleanser, I follow up with the Black Tea Kombucha, Vitamin Nectar, and the Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer. If you want to see results, you have to use the products consistently for about 6 weeks. Best products ever for my skin, and I love i!!!t
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Facial Cleanser

faceoff_negative.comments: Purchased 6 different things from the website including this cleanser. 4/6 things in the package came damaged (wouldn't have cared usually but bought these as a gift for other people). This cleanser specifically had been opened (the sticker they use to seal it was ripped). I sent customer service an email, they sent back emails through multiple threads instead of one asking all different things (what's your address, send us more pictures, etc,..). One email apologized and said they would send me a replacement if I respond with my address. When I did, they didn't respond for 5 days. When I FINALLY was able to reach customer service by calling them, I was told that I would need to return everything in order to receive either a refund or an exchange. At first, I was extremely upset about the condition the package arrived in, but I had hoped customer service would resolve the issue. When they initially promised a replacement and then backtracked on that offer, it only made the situation worse.
faceoff_negative.headline: Worst Customer Service & Damaged Products

rollup.name: Mini Soy pH-Balanced Hydrating Face Wash
